info.title: Auto-generated OAS of ProShop using OOPS

200.description: Successful response with PayPal client ID

400.description: Bad request (file validation or upload error)

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (1-based). Parsed via Number(req.query.pageNumber). Optional; defaults to 1 when not provided.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to filter products by name. Used to build a case-insensitive regex on the 'name' field (maps to MongoDB $regex). Optional.

200.description: A list of products with pagination information

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: JWT authentication cookie. The server expects a cookie named 'jwt' containing the JWT; this header should include that cookie (e.g. "jwt=<token>"). Required for authenticated admin access.

401.description: Unauthorized - authentication required or invalid token

403.description: Forbidden - authenticated user is not an admin

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Product ID (MongoDB ObjectId)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Product ID

requestBody.description: Product object with fields to update

200.description: Successful update - returns the updated product object

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Product ID (MongoDB ObjectId)

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authentication, e.g. "Bearer <token>" (required for Private/Admin routes)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Product ID (Mongoose ObjectId)

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Authentication cookie containing JWT (cookie name: jwt). Required for protected route.

requestBody.description: Review object containing rating and comment

200.description: A list of top rated products
Successful authentication - returns the authenticated user object

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Authentication cookie containing JWT. Send as: 'Cookie: jwt=<token>'

401.description: Authentication/authorization error (no token, invalid token, or not an admin)

requestBody.description: User object to register. Required fields: name, email, password.

400.description: Bad Request - user already exists or invalid user data

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: JWT cookie named 'jwt' (set by login). Required for authentication. Example: jwt=<token>

200.description: Successful response - returns the authenticated user's profile

401.description: Not authorized - missing or invalid token

requestBody.description: User object with fields to update. All fields are optional; only provided fields will be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to retrieve (MongoDB ObjectId)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

requestBody.description: User fields to update. Any of the properties may be provided (partial updates supported).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to delete (MongoDB ObjectId)

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT access token in the format 'Bearer <token>' (required - route is protected and requires admin privileges)

401.description: Unauthorized â€” missing/invalid token or not an admin

requestBody.description: Order payload. orderItems (non-empty array), shippingAddress and paymentMethod are required. Note: server will use product prices from the database and will ignore client-supplied prices.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for authentication. Format: 'Bearer <token>'. Required for protected routes.

200.description: A list of orders for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Order ID (MongoDB ObjectId)

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token (format: 'Bearer {token}'). Required for authenticated access.

401.description: Unauthorized - missing or invalid token (protect middleware)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Order ID

requestBody.description: PayPal payment result payload containing transaction id, status, update_time and payer information

400.description: Bad request - payment verification failed, transaction reused, or incorrect amount paid

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the order to mark as delivered

message.description: Error message explaining the authorization failure

stack.description: Error stack trace (included in non-production environments)

user.description: ObjectId of the user who created the review
ObjectId of the user who created the product

image.description: Image file to upload. Accepted file types: .jpg, .jpeg, .png, .webp. Single file under the field name 'image'.

isAdmin.description: Whether the user has admin privileges

user.description: User id (ObjectId) of the order owner

message.description: Error message indicating user was not found

stack.description: Error stack trace (included in non-production environments)
Error stack trace (included in non-production environments)
Error stack (may be null in production)

user.description: User id who created the product

_id.description: Product ID (used by server to look up canonical product and price)

name.description: Product name (optional on client; server will use DB values as authoritative)

price.description: Client-supplied price (ignored by server; server uses DB price)

clientId.description: PayPal client ID loaded from the PAYPAL_CLIENT_ID environment variable
